Dear Mrs. Battini,

Dear All,

 

I apologize for the length of this email, but I am concerned to give you all the explanations regarding the increase in the renewal premium for Y 2025. 

 

You will find above the renewal invitation of the policy : 

 

*	Period from 01/01/2025 to 01/07/2025
*	Premium due €54,465.58

chunks.text:
I apologize for the length of this email, but I am concerned to give you all the explanations regarding the increase in the renewal premium for Y 2025. 

 

You will find above the renewal invitation of the policy : 

 

*	Period from 01/01/2025 to 01/07/2025
*	Premium due €54,465.58 

                                                                                                                       

It has been reported on various channels, the French government has decided to increase the taxes on natural disasters from 12% to 20%.

This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025

 

 



 

Also note that the increase is also due to inflation, the cost of raw materials and labor.

I remain at your disposal for any info needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best. 

Joe Nasr

Head of General Insurance

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Vos  emails adressés en dehors de la journée de travail n’appellent pas à être lus dans l’immédiat

 

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction. 

 

*and in respect of marine cargo cover, this is subject to ensuring the cargo is not subject to an export control restriction from the country of export to the destination country or to the receiving party and, ensuring the act of carrying the cargo will not in itself trigger a risk of being subject to sanctions.

Bonjour,

Merci de nous transmettre l’avenant avec les valeurs pour 2025. Nous souhaitons recevoir le projet pour vérification des valeurs indiquées d’ici à la fin de la semaine prochaine.
Dans l’intervalle nous bloquons l’appel de prime.

Bien cordialement, 

 

Pauline BATTINI

Dear Mrs. Battini,

Dear All,

 

I apologize for the length of this email, but I am concerned to give you all the explanations regarding the increase in the renewal premium for Y 2025. 

 

You will find above the renewal invitation of the policy : 

 

*	Period from 01/01/2025 to 01/07/2025
*	Premium due €54,465.58 

                                                                                                                       

It has been reported on various channels, the French government has decided to increase the taxes on natural disasters from 12% to 20%.

This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025

 

 



 

Also note that the increase is also due to inflation, the cost of raw materials and labor.

I remain at your disposal for any info needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best. 

Joe Nasr

Head of General Insurance

Bonjour Madame Battini,

Tous nos vœux pour cette nouvelle année.

 

Nous intervenons auprès d’Axa France en leur demandant de nous adresser rapidement le projet avec les valeurs 2025 et ne manquerons pas de revenir vers vous. 

Avec nos sentiments les meilleurs. 

 

Dear Mr Battini,

All my wishes for Y2025.

We will intervene with Axa asking him the Y2025 Quotation and will revert.

 

All the best

Ce message provient d'un expéditeur externe - soyez prudent, en particulier avec les liens et les pièces jointes. 
This message is from an external sender - be cautious, particularly with links and attachments 

Dear Mrs. Battini,

Dear All,

 

I apologize for the length of this email, but I am concerned to give you all the explanations regarding the increase in the renewal premium for Y 2025. 

 

You will find above the renewal invitation of the policy : 

 

*	Period from 01/01/2025 to 01/07/2025
*	Premium due €54,465.58 

                                                                                                                       

It has been reported on various channels, the French government has decided to increase the taxes on natural disasters from 12% to 20%.

This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025

 

 



 

Also note that the increase is also due to inflation, the cost of raw materials and labor.

I remain at your disposal for any info needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best. 

Joe Nasr

Head of General Insurance

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Vos  emails adressés en dehors de la journée de travail n’appellent pas à être lus dans l’immédiat

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

If any sanctions matches are identified then this quote is void and, regardless of whether such quote has been accepted or not, Nasco will not be bound to offer or agree to enter into any contract.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction. 

 

*and in respect of marine cargo cover, this is subject to ensuring the cargo is not subject to an export control restriction from the country of export to the destination country or to the receiving party and, ensuring the act of carrying the cargo will not in itself trigger a risk of being subject to sanctions.

It has been reported on various channels, the French government has decided to increase the taxes on natural disasters from 12% to 20%.

This government decision is applied by all insurers with effect from 01/01/2025

 

 



 

Also note that the increase is also due to inflation, the cost of raw materials and labor.

I remain at your disposal for any info needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best. 

Joe Nasr

Head of General Insurance

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

If any sanctions matches are identified then this quote is void and, regardless of whether such quote has been accepted or not, Nasco will not be bound to offer or agree to enter into any contract.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction.
